website_summaries.verdict: These toe separators are worth considering for users who prefer softer material; but the downside is their questionable longevity.
pros: Have been praised for fitting well when worn in socks and shoes
cons: Gel material feels flimsy compared to similar separators
Pieces that fit between the toes are somewhat short
Only one size, but it fits most

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I think these are nice toe spacers. They are comfortable and I can wear them in Birkenstocks or in Altra shoes. One thing I learned the hard way - do NOT remove toe polish from toes with these on. I thought I'd kill two birds with one stone and remove my nail polish while stretching my toes. The remover disintegrated the gel spacers, particularly on the in-between bands. Guess I'll have to get a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: JodyC

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This gel thing fits perfect also inside socks/shoes..(i wear narrow 8) somewhat snugger at top but not a big diff. Gel contoured with movement..comfortable pic:gel on left foot
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived pretty quickly. They are practical to manage. However, I strongly encourage you to ease into wearing them. My hips & lower back are being re-aligned & corrected. I was not ready for the soreness & discomfort of the physiological adjustment. I wore them the first day for about 5-6 hours, plus, Im a heavy dude. Since then, I have accommodated to wearing them about an 1.5hr around the house or while sitting. I can feel foot muscles along big toe & outer arch, lower back/glute muscles tensing & releasing. I am looking forward to seeing the results of my body alignment do to this little guys.
customer_reviews.author: Ahimsa Osiris

customer_reviews.title: Not for large feet
customer_reviews.text: These gel spacers were the first that I ever had, I liked the silicon and they were very easy to clean and came in a useful plastic bag. Nonetheless, I wear a size 14W shoe and so these were a little too tight, but it was only noticeable when I was laying down as my toes would lose circulation. Also, my pinky toe wasn’t spread out much more than usual. These lasted about two weeks of daily use on a construction sight before the big toe ripped—pretty good given the fact that they were too small. These a best for smaller feet and light activity.
customer_reviews.author: Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various different toes separators. I have a moderate bunion but it causes me pain and dysfunction in my walking pattern. I have been wearing these for a few hours and hardly notice them! They are soft and comfortable, stay in place and easy to wear. Much better than any others I've tried. I might buy a second pair just in case! Time will tell if they change the actual structure of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Gel Toe Separator,Bestrice Toe Spacers Rubber Toe Stretchers Used for Sports Activities
customer_reviews.text: Amazing what this finger separator can do, its gel is very soft and comfortable, I did not know what the purpose of this separator was, until I read about it and bought it to do a test, since I am an athlete and I run many kilometers in My workouts, I started using it after training and I found it fabulous as I rest my feet, I am using it according to the indications, first 5 minutes after a certain time I will increase the time progressively. So far it is working for me to relax my feet. I recommend them ..!
customer_reviews.author: WALTER

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, good without shoes, can't wear with shoes
customer_reviews.text: Soft, not short enough to stay comfortable on pinky toes. Accumulate sock link/fuzz quickly. Definitely can't wear inside any of my shoes. Okay for a couple of hours each day. Mostly wanted it for wearing inside my shoes. Still, seems worth it to see if they help overall by wearing a while without shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty

customer_reviews.title: Toe circumference: I have a small circumference; yet these are still too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Can u pls make them in different sizes, depending on the circumference of a person’s toes? Toe circumference & foot size, 2 different things Toe circumference: I have a small circumference; yet these are still too tight. I’ll continue wearing them for short periods of time & hope!! they’ll stretch. Due to the fact that they separate my very squeezed together toes, they look cute on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: koae

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery and good packaging. I love these. They are so much more comfortable than other similar items. The material is soft and it feels good against the delicate tissue between my toes. The separation between the digits is just right. Not too over extended. I would recommend this product so far. It would come in handy while applying nail polish as well. My toes usually touch each other and mess up the polish. With this on, each toe has its defined space and they stay apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and seem to help!
customer_reviews.text: These have noticeably helped my proto-bunions since I started using them; I generally try to wear them for 15-30 minutes at night while I watch TV or read. They are more comfortable than the bulkier "Yoga Toes" I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M. Maze

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful! They look funny and at first they seem ...
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! They look funny and at first they seem awkward, but they work. Wearing the toe separators for an hour or two daily has really helped my feet. My toes always hurt, which make my back and legs hurt too. These separators have helped make my feet feel so much better! They work better than all the pricey insoles I have tried. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cajunwitch

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for about 1 1/2 hours while walking around and they rubbed so bad that they gave me a blister on top of one of my toes. I’m a size 8 with normal width feet. These things nearly killed me.
customer_reviews.author: G. Merkel

customer_reviews.title: Cuts off circulation.
customer_reviews.text: This a great concept but it cuts the circulation off on your toes. Within minutes my toes turned blue. Unfortunately, I would not suggest buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly and Erik G

customer_reviews.title: The material is SOFT not hard
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be made of hard, inflexible plastic, but it's SOFT rubber like the toe separators you can buy at Target. It works well for separating the toes and it washes up well but it does get STICKIER after washing. I have worn them around the house bare foot & the material holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: tabbycat

customer_reviews.title: They broke after only a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these and I liked them, but the part that goes around my big toe broke on BOTH of them within the first two weeks of having them... Might be worth it to pay more for a set made of a more durable material than these.
customer_reviews.author: googlemgmt

customer_reviews.title: I have very flat feet and poor posture. I didn't read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I starting getting blisters in between my toes because they were underlapping each other. I have very flat feet and poor posture. I didn't read the reviews, which is different for me. I should have worn them for 30 mins of less, yesterday I wore them for a few hours on the first day! Ooops, my feet are sore! Which I hope means they are doing what they are supposed to. :)
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good budget option!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these toe separators, especially for the price. I've been wearing them for around 15-45 minutes a day and I've noticed reduced foot cramping and pain through out the day. My only complaint is that they are kinda of a pain to get on, especially if you are use to yoga toes which are much easier but for the price difference I'd say it's worth it! Once they are on I actually find them more comfortable than my old yoga toes. Worth the try!
customer_reviews.author: Glsdoesgels

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, annoying to put on
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most annoying toe spreaders I have owned. Super flimsy, difficult to put on because the rubber twists. Only wore it one time- did the job- but got so frustrated putting it on that won’t wear this again. Ordering another product.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: It takes a little practice to get all your toes in the right spot
customer_reviews.text: These toe separators really work, and the soft silicon material is flexible. It takes a little practice to get all your toes in the right spot, I had problems with my middle toe and baby toe, but once on you can wear for hours. They fit fine with sandals and running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Seed Chomper

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: My toes aren't that long to wear these things comfortable. I cut them up, so I could use them on only my big toe. It worked that way, but they are not that durable.
customer_reviews.author: Popsy

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy them again
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have really bad feet and at the end of the day. We could all use a stretch, even our toes. They are always smashed together in shoes. They need attention too. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Bobbin

customer_reviews.title: Game changers!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these for anyone on their feet all day. Really eases foot and lower leg pain - even just 5-10 minutes of use. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brookworm

customer_reviews.title: It is holding up well and makes it easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid the flimsy silicone material between the toe spacers would tear, but that is not the case. It is holding up well and makes it easy to put on and take off. However, the toe spacers that go between the toes are too short (top to bottom) and will not stay between the toes making the product useless. This may also be due to the flimsy silicone material between the toe spacers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are super easy to wash and actually very easy to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this a smaller rating as they hurt my toes. They are super easy to wash and actually very easy to get on. I'm still trying to get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Pegasus

customer_reviews.title: These are fairly straightforward to use. They expand to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly straightforward to use. They expand to fit around my toes. My friend expresses more relief than I do, but I'm also on my feet less and in flip-flops more than she is. They have been helpful on days that my feet seem rather fatigued.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and work great!
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver product after being on my feet in heels for various events. I just slip on some socks and walk around the house with these on to help relieve pain.
customer_reviews.author: julesvern81

customer_reviews.title: then it aches so bad. I hope it straightens my little toes that ...
customer_reviews.text: They work. Hard to get on though, but when they go on they stay on. I can wear an hour, then it aches so bad. I hope it straightens my little toes that curl under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long toes
customer_reviews.text: I have long, skinny toes. These correctors don't reach the length of the in-between toe spaces, so they're stuck being on the top (outside) edge of toes to have any effect, which makes walking around without them falling off pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: CrunchyJeans

customer_reviews.title: These work well, and at a tiny fraction of ...
customer_reviews.text: These work well, and at a tiny fraction of the price that one pays for the CorrecToes. They are suited for wear inside or outside toe socks, and do fit into shoes with an appropriately-sized toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jones II

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: These are too soft! Hard to get on my toes and when I do get them on straight and want to take them off, I feel like they are fixing to break, they are so soft I wind up just yanking them off, feel like they are going to break every time!. I should have gotten more rigid ones.
customer_reviews.author: LLVC

customer_reviews.title: Turn my toes purple
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions and had high hopes for these. My shoe size is a women’s 9.5 wide and these separators turn my toes purple. I tried them for a week but have to stop using them. They only come in one size and they are NOT one size fits all.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B

customer_reviews.title: Bunion pain relief, finally
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day for relief of bunion pain. I put them on to wear around the house before bed and usual pull them off in my sleep but I have noticed so much more space between my toes and so much less pain from daily shoe wearing and impact.
customer_reviews.author: ChaelynW

customer_reviews.title: Dont wear them in the tub.
customer_reviews.text: These are great and make my toes feel good. I have super-high arches making my toes curl up badly. These force my toes apart in a comfortable way giving them some relief....exept in the tub. For some reason my toes turn purple and start hurting if I wear them in water. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Interesting concept
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to put on, perhaps because I have very small toes very close together. However, I am hoping these spacers will help. Fairly comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: DELORES L GALIAS

customer_reviews.title: Great for arches, too
customer_reviews.text: They separate my toes as expected. Unexpectedly, they help me lift my arch on an injured foot/ankle. I can wear them comfortably in my shoes for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and made well - no rips.
customer_reviews.text: Toe separators are made well and super soft between toes. My only issue with them is the separators were a little too big for my small feet so it made them a little uncomfortable. I’m a size 5.5-6 in shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Romano

customer_reviews.title: Great little toe stretchers.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I put them on when I'm just laying in the bed watching tv and even after a short time it feels like my feet are more stable feeling. I hope to start using these more regularly to see if it will alleviate the bunion pain I have.
customer_reviews.author: K. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Easy to Wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these toe separators because rounded toe, rigid tennis make my feet cramp. Especially when I do lunges pr calf raises. This was literally cramping my workout style. I decided to see if I could find a simple solution. Finding this product has been a lifesaver. It is very comfortable and easy to put on. My only complaint is the packaging says don't wear with socks or shoes, which is the only reason I bought them in the first place. The packaging counters everything said in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These work well. They are much cheaper than some of the other brands, but they work fine, and leave your feet relaxed and ready to go. Not too big, and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, I don’t use them as often as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Good, I don’t use them as often as I should. After a couple of hours my toes go numb sometimes, but I believe that is something on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Brii

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do feel that these help my feet, but the elastic on one end broke, so it’s awkward feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Trua

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. I literally look forward to getting home every ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I literally look forward to getting home every day and putting them on. My feet feel stretched, rejuvenated, and I am noticing a distinct change in posture and alignment as I continue to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not wash
customer_reviews.text: These work. However the material should not be washed as the instructions say they can. It gets very sticky after drying,
customer_reviews.author: AnastaceaLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Too big to wear with shoes on
customer_reviews.text: Too big to wear with shoes. Didn't want to send it back cause they were already on my feet. Since feet are gross, I wasn't gonna make anyone repackage these.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: These are really good actually. They have been working for me and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really good actually. They have been working for me and I could see a difference from wearing these after several weeks. Reason why I have it a 4 and not a 5 is becuase one of um is starting to tear abit and I thought the quality would of held longer but I’m hoping they won’t rip apart after a while going thru my toes
customer_reviews.author: patrick brizard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome....
customer_reviews.text: First I must say the order came right on time and it was the best choice ever. I made for my toes. After few days my toes start straighten out so well, still getting surprise how the toes are doing well. I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: I have size 13 feet. Product is a little too small but kinda works. Company was great and issued refund without any hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi H.

customer_reviews.title: Helps/hurts
customer_reviews.text: They help but hurt so bad The space for the big toe is small and cuts off circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Teriney Smith

customer_reviews.title: I lost one awhile back but I feel like if you use them frequently they may tear (especially ...
customer_reviews.text: they are flexible but almost a little too stretchy, I lost one awhile back but I feel like if you use them frequently they may tear (especially around big toe). they also get dirty easily so don't walk around in them
customer_reviews.author: vbl

customer_reviews.title: Toe separators
customer_reviews.text: I would totally recommend this product because I feel that my toes have been getting closer and closer over the years lol. But with this product my toes seemed to open up and I felt that felling of relief with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Dreamy soft texture! Easy to put on. I don't even know I have them on! Love'em!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazznme

customer_reviews.title: These really do work.
customer_reviews.text: These really do work. I've had a hammer toe for over 15 years and within one week it was gone
customer_reviews.author: George White

customer_reviews.title: I read other reviews, and they had said that ...
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews, and they had said that it stretches over swollen toes. However, they were very tight when my toes were swollen and cut the circulation of on my toes.
customer_reviews.author: brenda watling

customer_reviews.title: Dual duty buy
customer_reviews.text: They cost a lot less when I purchased them. I love these, they don't slide or move off until I take them off. A perfect addition for fitness or for polishing my toes
customer_reviews.author: Maren E Haugen

customer_reviews.title: It was recommend to me by my physical therapist to get to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was recommend to me by my physical therapist to get to superstore online due to my insurance not covering them. For a fraction of the price these were similar in quality to the ones my therapist sales
customer_reviews.author: Beau Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It needs more support. It’s literally like jello. It’s just awkward and doesn’t quite fit right either. Especially the pinky toe part.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Dexter

customer_reviews.title: About as flimsy as they can possibly be. I've ...
customer_reviews.text: About as flimsy as they can possibly be. I've had them 2 days and already ripped some parts. When these fall apart (probably next week) I'll spend a bit more on something else. I gave them two stars instead of one simply because they do actually spread the toes but it's immediately obvious they won't last.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: I have one toe that over laps one near to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one toe that over laps one near to it. These were a little to flexible to separate them.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta M. Lonnen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! Extremely uncomfortable, so I just use them when I have a pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy at first,  then the big squeeze
customer_reviews.text: These are great until you increase wearing time, then the tightness of the toe loops becomes a circulation issue, as in "my toes are cold and turning blue." As such these are relegated to no more than 5 to 10 minutes use at a time. I'm going to look for some only connected on the bottom. The material itself is soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AJ SHOPS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and works nicely for stretching out toes at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and works nicely for stretching out toes at the end of long day. Keep off feet if possible, if not wear slippers as the silicone will get sticky and dirty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: ouch
customer_reviews.text: These are very hard to get on. I wear them to bed and then sometime during the night I take them off because my feet hurt
customer_reviews.author: Sue V.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My toes have started to move towards each other as I get older (I am 47 and I also have some arthritis. These work just like they say and they re-align my toes. They are soft and I hardly notice I am wearing them. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Toe spacers
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep the toe separated So to avoid malformation. Good to ease some pain of the feet also.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Causes pain when you wear them.
customer_reviews.text: This product causes pain in your toes when you wear them.
customer_reviews.author: tgdx4

customer_reviews.title: Helped toe paim
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft go on easily and after wearing to bed several days relieved pain in my big toes
customer_reviews.author: cynthia clawges

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It hurt my feet and it was too elasticy.IDK if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great to bring my toes and feet into their natural condition again.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great for dancers
customer_reviews.text: Works really well to prevent bunions and to relieve foot pain! Great for dancers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Toe Splayer
customer_reviews.text: Does what they say their going to doing. Splays the toes. Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.author: CPL

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: They do what they're advertised to do. As others have said, they are really tight at first (mostly near the 3-5th toes), and it is very hard to walk in them in shoes. Good product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It says it is for sports but you are not supposed to wear it with a sock. Unless you play sports barefoot they are of no use. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F.

customer_reviews.title: Love these. May be a little uncomfortable at first
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected! Love these. May be a little uncomfortable at first, but easy to get used to
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Gartman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear. Providing much needed comfort to my foot area
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I could use stiffer ones
customer_reviews.text: They're comfy. My toes aren't aligned which is why I bought them. I feel like I could use stiffer ones, but for the cost & as a first-time buyer of yoga toes in general, these are great start!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable thing to wear but it helps
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I like it for the price. Very squishy and soft; keeps toes nicely separated, aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Fayzerstun

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Comfortable. Can sleep in them. Separating my toes. I see a difference. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Fits very nice. Material easy to manipulate but I’m very ginger ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits very nice. Material easy to manipulate but I’m very ginger with it to avoid tearing. I have tailors bunions. I wanted something to realign my pinky toes outward.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Works well once you get them on, but not for bed time.
customer_reviews.author: Yogatoga

customer_reviews.title: It's a blessing to my toes
customer_reviews.text: This toe separator is a blessing and inexpensive. Does the job and easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: To soft, it will move around and doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little while to get used to but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I love the squishiness
customer_reviews.text: I love them, they just take a little time to get over each toe but the gel feels very squishy between my toes and they are very comfortable while still providing the realignment and stretching that my toes and feet need.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Painful to wear. Does not improve bunion or help with running...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased due to having a bunion and also being a runner. I've found these actually uncomfortable to wear; downright painful... especially for an extended period of time, and no noticeable benefit in any way from them. I even tried to wear them through the pain in the hope that there would be some benefit, but I found none. Went to foot dr. (to get bunion diagnosed) and was told that these, nor any sort of toe spacer, will do anything to correct a bunion--only potential benefit would be comfort. I got no comfort from these.
customer_reviews.author: The Tenneys

customer_reviews.title: Great therapy for tight work shoes
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great and works as advertised. I recommend a couple of hours of this each day after work.
customer_reviews.author: A. Guimaraes

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these for my moms toes and they work good for her at night but it makes her feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my moms toes and they work good for her at night but it makes her feet and toes hurt when she wears them in her shoes
customer_reviews.author: TLONG

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunion forming & these separaters help with realigning my toes! I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: NOT Durable
customer_reviews.text: NOT satisfied at all!!! A waste of money, one has already broken. Not durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific for barefoot running as well as just hiking around in bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They seem to really be helping my toes,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MIRACULOUS
customer_reviews.text: I was moving heavy material and leaned back and injured my foot, after ultra sound, cat scan, x-ray and two dr. visits I WAS STILL DRAGGING MY MY FOOT. I PUT THESE ON WHEN THEY CAME, AND AFTER WEARING THEM FOR 5 HOURS MY OLD WALK HAD RETURNED. I PUT THEM ON AGAIN TODAY FOR LESS TIME BUT I INTEND TO CONTINUE UNTIL I'M SURE THE PROBLEM DOES NOT RECUR.
customer_reviews.author: john arnold

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft but ripped right way for my man's feet...
customer_reviews.author: J. Yamauchi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for using with shoes because its small size
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cano

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did what I expected . Helping out with foot pain and balance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does stretch out the toes
customer_reviews.text: I chose this type because the others look like they were made out of hard material. I find it difficult to get on not sure if its too small. My biggest fight is getting it wrapped around my big toe. It never seems to be the right size like the picture. But I am able to use it just the same. I keep it on for long periods of time because it is somewhat soft so it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: JazziTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good to wear temporarily
customer_reviews.text: I would go shopping in these but to kick back and watch a movie with your feet up, there are great. If you leave them on too long they hurt, so use in moderation. Nothing wrong with the product and if you have foot problems it’s worth a try. Foot problems are so different for each individual, i do suggest to try these, they did bring some comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Pyxis

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Thin loops not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Big Toe area was flimsy, thin and ripped. They are not bad comfort wise - they function and had no trouble wearing them for prolonged periods (30+ minutes). If you look at the pictures, the loops for the big and pinkie toes where after shoving or gently placing toes inside, the stretch can be a problem if you have a larger toe/foot. After a few wears (<5 times), they tore and did not live up to the quality. For reference, I am 9.5 MEN U.S which is actually below average (10.5 US).
customer_reviews.author: S. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Gel Toe Separators
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable gel toe separators. I bit wider than I expected but has helped.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I wear a kid's size and these tore
customer_reviews.text: They did work. In just 2 days I can stretch my toes farther than before. I can wear kids' shoes, and they tore my third time putting them on over my big toe. Would recommend trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gel Toe Separator,Bestrice Toe Spacers Rubber Toe Stretchers Used for Sports Activities, Yoga Practice & Running for Men and Women Bunion Pain Relief Toe Straightener Achilles Stretcher (1 pair)
feature_bullets: PAIN RELIEF:Safe and natural way to get foot pain relief and reduce the chance of bunions, hammer toe, corns, plantar fasciitis, varicose veins and cramping.One size fits most feet

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of durable, soft and safe medical-grade silicone gel, softening the painful sensitive skin to cover bunion with its flexible touch. Soft and easy to clean with soap and water.
ACTIVE-WEAR DESIGN:Awesome toes can be used at night, while watching tv, while practicing yoga, and even in wide-toed athletic shoes for running
HUMAN ENGINEERING DESIGN:The curved design conforms to the physiological structure of the foot.Avoid extrusion,promote blood circulation.
